StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [InsertUpdateSF86Signature]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@SF86SignatureID uniqueiden..er, @FormID uniqueiden..er, @FileName varchar(200), @IsCurrent bit
AS BEGIN
IF EXISTS(SELECT ID FROM [USMC].[SF86Signature] WHERE ID = @SF86SignatureID) BEGIN UPDATE [USMC].[SF86Signature] SET FormID = @FormID, FileName = @FileName, IsCurrent = @IsCurrent, LastUpdateDate = GETDATE() WHERE ID = @SF86SignatureID END ELSE BEGIN INSERT INTO [USMC].[SF86Signature] (ID, FormID, FileName, IsCurrent, LastUpdateDate) VALUES (@SF86SignatureID, @FormID, @FileName, @IsCurrent, GETDATE())
END
END
